summary: The soldier is a combat focused melee specialist. A master wielder of the heavy shield, she storms into every combat situation, plowing down opponents, eviscerating them in their stupor with proficient swordplay, and keeping them on their heels with stamina-fueled power bashes.
descriptionHtml:
Taken Veterans - Argonian Soldier
The Soldier is a Sword and Board Melee Specialist

Shell, the Female Argonian Soldier,
or Stack, the Male Argonian Soldier

The soldier is a level 30 combat focused melee specialist. A master wielder of the heavy shield, she storms into every combat situation, plowing down opponents, eviscerating them in their stupor with proficient swordplay, and keeping them on their heels with stamina-fueled power bashes.

Soldier Attributes:
	180 Magicka
	180 Health
	230 Stamina

Soldier Skills:
	Block 100
	Heavy Armor, Restoration 75
	One-Handed, Archery 60
	Destruction, Alteration, Enchanting, Smithing, Conjuration, Sneak, Alchemy, Illusion, Alteration, Pickpocket, Light Armor, Two-Handed, Lockpicking 15

1@100           2@75          2@60          13@15
1*(100*101/2) + 2*(75*76/2) + 2*(60*61/2) + 13*(15*16/2)			
= 15,970 [url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Total Experience Spent In Skills[/url]

Soldier Abilities:
	Agent of Mara (Resist Magic 15%)
	Resist Disease 50% (Argonian Heritage)
	Waterbreathing (Argonian Heritage)
		
Soldier Spells:
	Fast Healing, Steadfast Ward, Close Wounds, Greater Ward, Heal Other, Circle of Protection, Grand Healing, Repel Undead, Turn Greater Undead

Soldier Shouts:
	Disarm	(Zun Haal Viik)
	
Soldier Gear:
	Dawnbreaker (Sword) 0004e4ee
	Spellbreaker (Shield) 00045f96
	Rahgot (Helmet) 00061cc0
	Ebony Armor of Rejuvenation	000fe2ed
	Ebony Boots of Major Stamina	0010df83
	Ebony Gauntlets of Major Wielding	000cf865
	
\"Veterans\" are pre-built characters, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored, and adapted to your new level--allowing you to try out advanced play-styles and quest-lines avoiding hours of required preliminaries.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation and Use:
Unzip the saved game in the download to your .../My Games/Skyrim/Saves folder, then load it in Skyrim.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
1.0 Lookin\' Good
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Whenever a character earns a rank, r, in a skill they gain r experience. When a character has 0 in all skills they have zero experience, and when they have 100 in all skills, at level 81.5, they have 90,900 experience. A character normally hits Level 30 at 15,865 Total Experience.

Taken Veterans should look good with any texture or mesh mods you may use, if any. The mods used in the screenshots include:
Face Textures (Female): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url]
Face Textures (Male): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]

Look in the discussions area for the batch commands allowing you to make a veteran out of a character you\'ve created yourself!

More Info:
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Experience Table[/url]
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimCharBatch]Tips on making your own veterans[/url]

Drop a Taken Veteran save game in your Saves folder and load it up. See what you think!
author: Taken
